::Halucigen::
"Greetings...My name is Halucigen. I was talking to Magmatron before
his departure and I have come looking to join you. I like the way your
work. TRapping and threatning.  And don't worry...if i really wanted
out my Corrosion Missiles would take care of that. I would like to
speak with you in person." Halucigen replied calmly his small 5 foot
frame standing very cofidently.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Robert Thomas <Kinger1984@y...> wrote:
>  Guiledart saw ahucenigen on the monitor. "Oh good a
> lab rat." A wall came up around the bot closeing him
> into a 5 by 5 box. a screen appeared with guiledart on
> it. "Well hello my friend. Dont bother trying to blast
> your way out of there it will be futile. One question.
> Why are you here?"
